channel.title: Problem with resolution
channel.description:
Hello everyone :slight_smile: If I write today, it's for a problem I met on Black Mesa, a problem very annoying. By the way, I can't put the mod in 1920x1080 resolution ! It's very strange, I can only put it on 1280x720 :| And I have a powerful PC : Intel Core i7 AMD Radeon R9 270 16 GB RAM
And my screen is full HD...
I need help to resolve this thing :frowning: Can you help me ? Thank you and I see you later :slight_smile:

item.title: Problem with resolution
item.dc:creator: G-Man_fr
item.description:
Hi Thank you for you’re big help ! I will try when I will with my PC and I tell you if that work, okay ? See you later

UPDATE : Thank you very much ! That work perfectly ! Thank you again for you’re fantastic help !

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with resolution
item.dc:creator: BuzzKillington
item.description:
My guess is you’re trying to use a 16:10 aspect ratio correct? Switch it to 16:9 - then you can change it to the optimal resolution for your monitor. Also, 16:10 doesn’t increase quality, it just allows certain games to support ‘weird’ resolutions like ‘1366x768’.

Read full topic
